comment: Clark herself is pretty cool. You dont have to show up to class but when you do its usually fun, relaxed time. The problem is not Clark. The problem is 100% the interface you have to get your book and assignments through (Bearface). I LITERALLY FAILED THIS CLASS BECAUSE OF BEARFACE. Clark wont/ cant do anythi ng to help with your tech issues.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Best professor I have ever had. Really knows what she is talking about. Technology is not very friendly. But professor is legit. And hot

Warning: register with caution. Her lectures are just repetitive information that you already know read vebatum. This professor is unresponsive to students' contacting her and will ignore your emails. Cancels class after a 7 minute lecture.  Randomly selective on which assignments she actually  grades. Don't talk, laugh, eat, or drink. Good luck.

She is friendly and easy going, but the website (Bearface) used for this class is very very confusing and unreliable. One time she assigned a four page paper in size 10 font for one kid making a joke in class. Everyone was punished because of it so that sucked. There is no tests so you don't really have to show up. Good luck with Bearface.

She is a very cool and nice teacher, very funny and makes the class periods interesting. However, it is the most unclear class I have ever taken in  my life. You literally never know what is going on and the website used stinks. The unclarity makes the class a lot harder than it should be.

The professor often cancels classes, and presents a power point for lectures. One issue I had was there was not much clarity on when assignments were due, because the website is still new to the class. Also, she got mad at us once & assigned a 4 page paper at 10 pt. font just to punish us.  The content was interesting and useful for everyday life.
